definitions.definition: A very large and destructive wave , generally caused by a tremendous disturbance in the ocean, such as an undersea earthquake or volcanic eruption; often a series of waves (a wave train ).
A large and generally unstoppable surge.

main_definition: A very large and destructive wave , generally caused by a tremendous disturbance in the ocean, such as an undersea earthquake or volcanic eruption; often a series of waves (a wave train ).
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A large and generally unstoppable surge.
